Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Six of eight mutations were observed at least twice .

Let's think step by step.

1. Mutations: Mutations are not considered diseases in the traditional sense, but they can lead to various genetic conditions or diseases. In this context, mutations are the entities being referred to.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

1. Diseases (implied, as mutations can lead to various diseases)

The paragraph itself does not explicitly mention any specific diseases. It only mentions the observation of mutations.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| (Implied: various diseases that can be caused by mutations) |

Again, the paragraph does not mention any specific diseases, only the observation of mutations.
